name: The Maze of Eternal Doom
description:
The Maze of Eternal Doom is a casual exploring maze puzzle game. You play as Alice, Bryn and Cassius, they should work together to escape from the maze made by the evil spirit great Temarry.

Hint: Stand on  two pressure plates with both characters in each level to complete them.

For the best experience, play with the windows download.

┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓

Controls

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Ability: E/Mouse 1

Switch Characters: 1 and 2

Pause: P/Esc

┗━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┛

┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓

Credits

Music: Lyckstolp 

Voice Actors: Baran Altuncu

Programming: William Zhang, Tharun 

3D Artists: Peristroff (Pablo), @amydotwav 

2D Artists: Dreamsprite [dreamsprite.deviantart.com] 

┗━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┛

Spoilers: This contains the solutions for the maze problems, use at your own discretion.  https://imgur.com/a/vAPfuMT
